histore.archive.provenance.column module¶

Class representing provenance information for dataset columns in an archive. Column provenance information is represented as operators that describe the differences in a single dataset column between two dataset snapshots.

class histore.archive.provenance.column.DeleteColumn(key)¶

Bases: histore.archive.provenance.base.ProvOp

Provenance class representing the column deletion operator.

class histore.archive.provenance.column.InsertColumn(key)¶

Bases: histore.archive.provenance.base.ProvOp

Provenance class representing the column insert operator.

class histore.archive.provenance.column.UpdateColumn(key, name=None, position=None)¶

Bases: histore.archive.provenance.base.ProvOp

Provenance class representing the column update operator. The column update operator maintains additional information about potential changes in the column position and the column name.

Get updated column name.

dict
